p:
Pretreatment of aorta with cyclooxygenase inhibitor; indomethacin (92.95% ± 2.73; p > 0.05) did not produce any significant difference of vasorelaxation induced by AcEO precontracted with phenylephrine. Therefore, aorta preincubated with endoplasmic reticulum calcium-ATPase inhibitor; thapsigargin (45.34% ± 6.58; p < 0.001), and calcium channel type VOC blocker; verapamil (48.12% ± 8.21; p < 0.001) produced a sub-maximum inhibitory effect of vasorelaxation induced by AcEO (0.1–100 μg/ml) (Figs. 6b and 7).Fig. 7
Original tracing showing the vasorelaxant effect of A. campestris L. essential oil (AcEO) on isolated aorta pre-contracted with Phen 1 μM (a) and in the presence of Verapamil (b) and Thapsigargin (c)
